title: Bill O'Brien Checks In
description:
Wendi Nix, David Pollack, and Greg McElroy discuss Bill O'Brien's new position as OC of the Alabama Crimson Tide, what the team will look like next year, Saban's legacy, and the best plays of the year.

itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The Crew talks about Bill O'Brien as Alabama's new offensive coordinator
